entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
